ioedata.user.service

Interface UserService


  • public interface UserService
    This interface provides abstract methods for dealing with users, and it will be implemented by UserServiceImpl class.
    Author:
    ajou

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • registerUser

        boolean registerUser(UserValue userVal)
                     throws org.json.JSONException,
                            org.jose4j.lang.JoseException,
                            ioedata.exception.factory.UserDuplicateException
        Register new users. Before registration, it first check whether the user name has existed in the database; if so, go on checking whether the user has registered with the same WiFi SSID. If there isn't a user registered with the user name and the SSID, then register and return the result.
        Parameters:
        userVal -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        org.jose4j.lang.JoseException
        ioedata.exception.factory.UserDuplicateException

      • authenticateUser

        boolean authenticateUser(UserValue userVal)
                         throws ioedata.exception.factory.UserNotExistException
        Authenticate a user. If user name, user WiFi SSID and password matches simultaneously, return true; else, return false.
        Parameters:
        userVal -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ioedata.exception.factory.UserNotExistException
